name: Oak Forest
description:
-Description-

Oak Forest, is a small cozy forest environment. Where the player can explore an atmospheric woodland. 

-Basically a Unity Tech Demo-

A little game that was quickly put together in Unity, to learn the ropes of the engine.

It will continue to act as a sandbox and will be progressively expanded upon. Hopefully eventually forming into an actual shippable game.

-It's Current Form-

In its current form, Oak Forest is a quick little demo, featuring player movement and an atmospheric 2d environment.

This project will be heavily expanded on, as it's currently in it's very early stages.

Game Roadmap/Progress: https://trello.com/b/Hgzx27fX/oak-forest

Asset pack used: https://brullov.itch.io/oak-woods

I WOULD LOVE IT IF YOU DOWNLOADED THE GAME AND TOLD ME YOUR THOUGHTS OR WHAT YOU WOULD LIKE ADDED
